PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-04932019-05-09,  PCH,  ,  , 
ActNational Capital Act
SubjectLease with D.H.C. Automation and Controls Ltd. ** NCC **
PrecisOrder Approving that the National Capital Commission grant an option to extend the LEASE with D.H.C. AUTOMATION AND CONTROLS LTD. for a period of 5 years, beginning on December 1, 2019, for the real property known as Building 1226, located at 1740 Woodroffe Avenue, in Ottawa.
AttachmentsAttachment
